aboutUs.title: About US
aboutUs.subtitle: A leading full-service IT and managed services provider, dedicated to ensuring the ongoing health of organizations' IT systems through 24/7/365 monitoring and support.

stats.label: We provide end-to-end IT and managed services, ensuring system reliability and long-term business growth.

trustedPartner.title: Your trusted neighbourhood tech partner
trustedPartner.subtitle: When your tech fails or your IT hits a snag, ITS steps in. Stay calm and find a service point near you.

techInGoodHands.title: Your tech is in good hands
techInGoodHands.description: Our local experts have completed 21 million+ repairs, and they can help you too, whether you need a fix, setup, accessories, or even a cleaning for your phone or game console.

franchise.title: Franchise Opportunity
franchise.description: Partner with a proven IT service brand and build a scalable, high-demand business with full support and a powerful service model.

items.question: What services do you offer?
items.answer: We offer a comprehensive range of IT services including managed IT support, cybersecurity, cloud hosting, network security, hardware and software solutions, and much more. Our services are designed to meet the diverse needs of businesses of all sizes.

items.question: Do you offer on-site support?
items.answer: Yes, we provide both on-site and remote support services. Our team can visit your location when needed or assist you remotely for faster resolution.

items.question: What are your operating hours?
items.answer: We operate Monday through Friday from 9 AM to 6 PM, and we also offer emergency support services outside regular hours for critical issues.

items.question: Do you provide remote support?
items.answer: Yes, we offer comprehensive remote support services that allow us to assist you quickly and efficiently without needing to be on-site.

items.question: What is your pricing?
items.answer: Our pricing varies based on the services you need. We offer flexible pricing plans and can provide a custom quote based on your specific requirements. Contact us for more details.
